long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize is a tool to extract the key ideas and takeaways from any web page in the Internet. Just select the text you want to summarize and it will do the job.

How it works? 
- Select the text 
- Right-click and go to Summarize and select what do you need: "Summarize this text" or "List key takeaways"
- The extension will replace the selected text with what you need

New! 
Supports the newest gpt-4-turbo and gpt-4o models!
Plus the classic gpt-3.5 and gpt-4 models

Configuration
 Summarize does not requiere any monthly subscription, it just needs a ChatGPT API key to work. 
To get you OpenAI API key go to: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key
Summarize will automatically ask for your OpenAI API key if it is not configured. To change your API key go to Summarize options, right-click on Summarize icon and click "Options".

Privacy concerns
Summarize extension acts as an interface between your browser and OpenAI. The extension does not store the contents you send to OpenAI API.
